name: Fishing Bears
description:
Fishing Bears brings the popular flash game Fishing Girl to iOS. The game has been built from the ground up and new ideas have been implemented to make a greater and more exciting experience.

Includes:

Chill out mode:

Beat the stress and fish until your hearts content, no lives or gameovers, just fun gameplay.

A choice of two bears to play as.

Many varieties of fish to catch, with many more to come.


Future updates:

Story Mode: Can you complete all the quests and find the hidden treasure of Bear Village?

Endurance Mode: How many fish can you catch without losing a single lure?

Fish Pond: You can keep your prize catches and special fish here and get rewards for looking after them!

Game Center: Earn Achievements and get to the top of the leaderboards for Endurance Mode.
